鵲巢鳩占.definition: the magpie made a nest, the turtledove dwells in it (idiom); to reap where one has not sown

鵲橋.definition: magpie bridge across the Milky Way between Altair and Vega where Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed an annual meeting

鵲色鸝.definition: (bird species of China) silver oriole (Oriolus mellianus)

鵲鴝.definition: (bird species of China) oriental magpie-robin (Copsychus saularis)

鵲鴨.definition: (bird species of China) common goldeneye (Bucephala clangula)

鵲鷂.definition: (bird species of China) pied harrier (Circus melanoleucos)
